channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Some admirers of Charlie Kirk hope response to his death signals start of a religious revival
item.description: With Vice President JD Vance calling Charlie Kirk “a martyr for Christianity,” some Kirk admirers suggest his assassination will galvanize throngs of people — notably young conservatives — to become more engaged in evangelical and Catholic churches.

item.title: What we know about autism’s causes and any potential link to Tylenol
Why was Jimmy Kimmel’s late-night show suspended and then reinstated? Here’s what we know
